physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No progression of optic nerve or visual field defects noted during the follow-up period.

relevant_findings.Fundus Examination: Tilted nerves with thin temporal rims and peripapillary atrophy, cup-to-disc ratio 0.6 in both eyes
relevant_findings.Visual Field Defects: Superior nasal step in right eye and dense superior arcuate defect in left eye

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in optic nerve appearance or visual field defects over 8 years; stable findings.

relevant_findings.Fundus Examination: Tilted nerves, cup-to-disc ratios 0.7 in the right eye and 0.6 in the left
relevant_findings.Visual Field Defects: Dense superior defect in right eye and early arcuate defect in left

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Visual field defects showed no significant change relative to presentation over follow-up.
